main.name: Mcnikko Pinlac
main.description: All-rounder: Full Stack Web Developer, Creative Digital Marketer, and Technopreneur
main.bio: Good Day Client! I'm an Experienced All-rounder, flexible to almost any kind of digital tasks. I'm a Full Stack Web Developer (MERN Stack: MongoDB, Express, Reactjs, Nodejs), Creative Digital Marketer, and Entrepreneur. Steve Jobs, Jack Ma and Elon Musk are my influencers. Business and Technology is my passion.
main.contactmessage: Get In Touch! I am eager to help with freelance work. I will find the best-suited SOLUTIONS at 100%!

resume.skillmessage: Full Stack Web Development (HTML, CSS, JS, MongoDB, Expressjs, Reactjs, Nodejs), Wordpress.com Web Designing and Management, Search Engine Optimization (Google Webmaster Tools), Online research and business development, Graphic Design and Photo/Video Editing (Canva and Adobe Creative Suite), Social Media Marketing (Facebook Ads and Google Ads), Online Marketing (Ad listings Locanto and Craigslist), E-commerce (Shopify Setup), Content Writing and Blogging, Computer Systems and Network Setup, Computer Troubleshooting, Microsoft Productivity Softwares (Word, Excel, etc), Google G Suite

education.description: Develop computer programming solutions for various businesses. Build and manage databases. Design, create, and publish dynamic web pages. Communicate effectively with clients and fellow workers. Assess and troubleshoot software and computer hardware problems
